Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: Channel 4 ( United Kingdom)

Hidden Talent attempts to find out just how far can natural talent really go and what if it could change your life. Hundreds of randomly selected people are put through a series of different tests to find those with hidden abilities. Nine of them then find out if they can go from being a total novice to a top-class performer in a short period of time.


(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-31362)
